name: Five Senses
lyric:
There are five ways to figure out

What something is all about

You've got five senses

There are five ways to figure out

What something is all about

You've got five senses yeah

See touch smell taste hear

You can see a banana

You can touch a banana

You can smell a banana

You can taste a banana
And you can hear a banana
Hear a banana

It makes a squishy sound when you eat it

Your eyes can see a banana

Your hands can touch a banana

Your nose can smell a banana

Your tongue can taste a banana
And your ears can hear a banana

You chew louder than anyone I've ever heard

Sing it with me
Your eyes can

Your hands can

Your nose can

Your tongue can

Your ears can

Five senses see touch smell taste hear
